Trigger You attempt a melee Strike against your opponent, but haven't rolled yet.

Requirements You're in a duel, you're trained in Perception, and you rolled a Perception check for initiative this round.

You pick a precise moment to attack, giving you an edge. Your opponent is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] against the attack. If your opponent is using Deception for initiative when this ability is used, they are instead off-guard until the start of their next turn.
